This is a more practical application of the [[Multi-Size Technique]]. Rather than increase the size of their entire body, the user increases the size of only specific body parts, typically the arms and legs. Because of the larger size, physical attacks made with the expanded limbs do greater damage than normal. The limbs' growth is very fast, giving users a way of taking opponents by surprise. In the anime, the expanded mass can also be used a powerful defense from [[Chakra Enhanced Strength|blunt-force assaults]], cushioning the impact to negate it.<ref>''[[Boruto OVA]]''</ref> 

As with other techniques of the [[Akimichi clan]], its [[chakra]] requirements are quite high,<ref name="d2"/> to the point that, in Part I, [[Chōji]] takes one of the [[Three Coloured Pills]] before using this technique.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 189</ref>

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 2]]'', Chōji uses this technique under the name {{translation|"Super Fly Swatter"|超ハエたたき|Chō Haetataki}}.
** In ''[[Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja 4]]'', he says "Super Expansion Jutsu", the English name for [[Super Multi-Size Technique]]. This doesn't occur in the Japanese dub.
